## Generate sample data for pilot
```{r}
#create dataframe
# number of participants
n <- 30
# set mean values per trial pre and post
# m1_pre <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
# m2_pre <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
# m3_pre <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
# m4_pre <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
# m1_post <- m1_pre*1.2
# m2_post <- m2_pre*1.4
# m3_post <- m3_pre*1.0
# m4_post <- m4_pre*1.8

# set covariate values of familiarity
f1 <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
f2 <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
f3 <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)
f4 <- rnorm(1, 0, 2)

df <- data.frame('PID' = sort(rep(1:n, 4)), 'trial' = rep(1:4, 30), 'pre_post' = c(rep('pre',60), rep('post',60)))

df$moral_score <- rnorm(120, 0, 2)
                                                                                   


```
##Descriptive Statistics and Plots
